name: lodgingProducts
description: This function returns the lodging resources near a given location.

destination.description: The destination can be a city, address, airport, or a landmark.

exhibit_maxnum.description: Int like 2, 3(default), 4. It determines how many items to exhibit.

serpapi_key.description: Parameter defines the SerpApi private key to use.

name: flightProducts
description: This function returns the flight information between two cities.

departureDate.description: Date formatted as "yyyy-mm-dd". It shoule be LATER than the PRESENT date. Default: the date of tomorrow.

adult_num.description: Number of adults for flight tickets. Default: 1.

exhibit_maxnum.description: Maximum number of items to show. Default: 3.

amadeus_api_key.description: The API key used to authenticate amadeus API.

amadeus_api_secret.description: The API secret used to authenticate amadeus API.

name: landscapeProducts
description: This function returns the scenic spot information given a destination.

destination.description: String of cityname, destination of arrival.

exhibit_maxnum.description: Int like 2, 3(default), 4. It determines how many spots to display.

serpapi_key.description: Parameter defines the SerpApi private key to use.

name: carProducts
description: Given a pickup location, returns a list of car rentals nearby.

pickup_location.description: String of city name or location for the car rental pickups.

exhibit_maxnum.description: Int like 2, 3(default), 4. It determines number of rental cars to display.

serpapi_key.description: Parameter defines the SerpApi private key to use.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
